JobFullDesc: Facebook seeks a highly motivated team player to serve as Lead Counsel for FDA Compliance on Facebook’s Legal Compliance team. This position will play a key role providing legal counsel to Facebook’s product teams on a range of FDA and analogous international compliance issues in the medical device area, as well as providing regulatory support in transactional matters. This role requires the building of compliance counseling infrastructure that can scale alongside Facebook’s global growth, while keeping pace with the business’ daily counseling demands – all in partnership with a broad-range of legal and business cross-functional teams.  This is a great opportunity to join a growing legal team and to work on novel issues, products and technologies in an exciting, fast-paced environment.Provide day-to-day legal counsel to a broad range of business partners on risk and legal obligations concerning FDA and analogous international obligations in the medical device area.Provide guidance on FDA and analogous international regulatory engagement strategy and coordinate response to regulatory inquiries and enforcement actions. Review and advise on key FDA and analogous international regulatory filings and briefing documents.Advise on FDA and analogous international compliance obligations arising under contracts, licenses, laws, regulations, and other legal requirements.Monitor emerging medical device laws and regulations potentially applicable to Facebook’s products.  Lead cross-functional response to new medical device related legal obligations.Assess opportunities for developing policies, resources, tools, and processes to scale compliance counseling that optimizes compliance impact.Develop and align FDA programming mapped to the pillars of an effective compliance program.Develop, support, and execute key FDA training for targeted audiences.Support escalations of material medical device risks to leadership.Maintain strong, trust-based relationships across a broad-range of business and legal verticals.Travel domestically and internationally as needed.MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONSJ.D. degree with membership in at least one U.S. state bar.5+ years of attorney experience counseling clients on FDA compliance with respect to both hardware and software products.Experience advising and training diverse populations.Interpersonal skills and a commitment to professionalism and collegiality.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSJ.D. degree with membership in at least one U.S. state bar.5+ years of attorney experience counseling clients on FDA compliance with respect to both hardware and software products.Experience advising and training diverse populations.Interpersonal skills and a commitment to professionalism and collegiality.Facebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together.
